titleStmt.title: Magna veritas, or, John Gadbury, student in physick and astrology, not a papist but a true Protestant of the Church of England published for the satisfaction of all such as know not the said John Gadbury and yet give credit to all kinds of scandals and falshoods that pass upon his much injured reputation since his late unfortunate confinement.
titleStmt.author: Gadbury, John, 1627-1704.

titleStmt.title: Magna veritas, or, John Gadbury, student in physick and astrology, not a papist but a true Protestant of the Church of England published for the satisfaction of all such as know not the said John Gadbury and yet give credit to all kinds of scandals and falshoods that pass upon his much injured reputation since his late unfortunate confinement.
titleStmt.author: Gadbury, John, 1627-1704.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Gadbury. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
